ai-tha-ap345:1.1_0: “A teacher called ‘one who has committed an offense’,
ai-tha-ap345:1.2_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap345:1.3_0: Seeing the three kinds of falling off the three worlds,
ai-tha-ap345:2.4_0: I went to the realm of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tha-ap345:3.1_0: he saw the three hundred and seventy-seven limbs,
ai-tha-ap345:3.2_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap345:5.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap345:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap345:5.4_0: the fruit here is the lump of wealth.
ai-tha-ap345:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Jotipāla.
ai-tha-ap345:9.1_0: Third: Victory over the third Elder Joyful Gods,
